metadata.synopsis: Banter between SH and Minthara in Act 3

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Is drow society as the books say? It almost sounds tempting - matriarchal power, flourishing to its greatest extent.
1.context: NodeContext: Curious. Idle banter. Can be applicable to either of Shadowheart's arcs

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: It flourishes because the strong feed on the weak. Charming as you are, child, you would be nourishment for the matrons mothers.
0.context: NodeContext: Slightly taken aback/not going there. Idle banter. Can be applicable to either of Shadowheart's arcs

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.context: NodeContext: Slightly taken aback/not going there. Idle banter. Can be applicable to either of Shadowheart's arcs
